channel.title: ZOMG Thats SO WIERD :' (Zoltanman please help me)
channel.description: Right, i was fighting on my server with my friend, as he was about to get k0ed, this happened: [code]---BlitzScape by Wolf |-Enabled-| --- Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at client.Attack(client.java:20340) at client.process(client.java:13787) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:50) [/code] WTF plz help my server is supposed to be a pk server, this dont help :'(

item.title: ZOMG Thats SO WIERD :' (Zoltanman please help me)

item.title: ZOMG Thats SO WIERD :' (Zoltanman please help me)
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

This is all i got at 20340 and around it if(!UseBow){ if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff < 0)) { hitDiff2 = EnemyHP; GotKill = true; ResetAttack(); } else hitDiff2 = hitDiff; } LINE 20340!!! PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = hitDiff2; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; p.KillerId = playerId; if(!UseBow){ double TotalExp = 0; if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(50 * hitDiff2); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(12.5 * hitDiff2); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(12.5 * hitDiff2); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); } actionTimer = 4; } } } return false; }

Read full topic
